items.summary: Fix the Skipped Day Reset backend logic so that when a user triggers a skipped day reset, all morning and evening routine checkbox states are set to unchecked (false) and the streak counter is reset to 0.

Fix the Skipped Day Reset frontend handler in the Start New Day dialog so that after the reset mutation completes, the UI reflects all checkboxes as unchecked and the streak count displayed as 0 â€” by invalidating or updating the relevant React Query caches for routines and streak data.
